title: WTB these last 8 T206's to complete the set
author: Scott L.

posts.post_title: WTB these last 8 T206's to complete the set
posts.post_content:
.....minus the big 6. All HOfers and SLers. Looking for presentable SGC 10's thru 40 with 20-30 being my sweet spot. Will also buy raw but they must be guaranteed to grade numerically with SGC.

Please let me know what you have.

Thanks.

Scott

Hey Scott,

If you don't mind me asking, how are you doing on acquiring the last 45?

Hey Eric

I've been able to knock 3 off the list. A Bresnahan with bat from a really good guy ;), a SGC 40 Walsh and an SGC 30 Young Glove Shows. Still many more to go.

Thank you to all who have e-mailed so far, please keep them coming.

Best,

Scott

Hi Mike

I sent you an email through the system here as hotmail seems to be on the fritz today. I know they've had some issues with the email service from here so let me know if you don't see it.

Best,

Scott
